channel.title: pleasent on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in pleasent on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Idealism knocked down
item.description: From November 2007 Channel the feelings into art and in that preoccupation, the feelings are absorbed more easily; like a flood, which suddenly found the porous route to the storm drains.

item.title: LfE 14: Traveling to Slough
item.description: 15/12/2009 Hello everyone! Hope this letter finds you all in good health. My adventures are more mobile now. Iâ€™m on the train to Slough to visit family for the holidays.
